Real-Time Driver Model

Collaboration diagram for Real-Time Driver Model:

Detailed Description

The Real-Time Driver Model (RTDM) provides a unified interface to both users and developers of real-time device drivers. Specifically, it addresses the constraints of mixed RT/non-RT systems like RTAI. RTDM conforms to POSIX semantics (IEEE Std 1003.1) where available and applicable.
